title: msuatgunerli.github.io
text:
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
git add . git commit -m “Initial Quarto website commit” base ❯ git branch -M main git push -u origin main
Edit your _quarto.yml
project: type: website output-dir: _site # Ensure the output directory is set correctly
execute: freeze: auto
mkdir -p .github/workflows touch .github/workflows/publish.yml
name: Deploy Quarto Website to GitHub Pages
on: push: branches: main # Deploy when changes are pushed to the main branch workflow_dispatch: # Allows manual trigger from GitHub Actions
jobs: build-deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest permissions: contents: write steps: - name: Check out repository uses: actions/checkout@v4
  - name: Set up Quarto
    uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/setup@v2

  - name: Render the Quarto website
    run: quarto render

  - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
    uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/publish@v2
    with:
      target: gh-pages
    env:
      GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
